alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:32PM MST until December 12 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING FOR THE HIGHER ELEVATIONS OF THE CAMAS PRAIRIE... * WHAT...Snow for the higher elevations of the Camas Prairie. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Nezperce, Soldiers Meadow Road, Craigmont, and Winchester. * WHEN...Until 7 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
